rxrmask
  • Core
  • View page source

Core

Atom module for RXR-Mask.

This module provides the Atom class and related utilities for representing atomic species in X-ray reflectometry calculations.

class rxrmask.core.atom.Atom(Z, name, ff, ffm=None, mass=0.0)[source]

Atomic species for X-ray reflectometry calculations.

Stores atomic properties, form factors, and mass. Mass is auto-loaded from database.

Z

Atomic number

name

Chemical symbol (e.g., ‘Fe’, ‘O’)

ff

X-ray form factor model

ffm

Magnetic form factor model (optional)

mass

Atomic mass in g/mol (auto-loaded if 0.0)

load_atomic_mass()[source]

Load atomic mass from materials database.

Returns:

Atomic mass in g/mol

Return type:

float

Raises:

NameError – If atom symbol not found in database

rxrmask.core.atom.find_atom(symbol, atoms)[source]

Find atom by chemical symbol.

Parameters:

  • symbol (str) – Chemical symbol (e.g., ‘Fe’, ‘O’)

  • atoms (list[Atom]) – List of Atom objects to search

Return type:

Atom | None

Returns:

Atom object if found, None otherwise

Chemical compound representation for X-ray reflectometry.

Provides classes for representing compounds and their atomic components.

class rxrmask.core.compound.Compound[source]

Chemical compound in multilayer structure.

Represents a compound with composition, physical properties, and structural parameters.

name

Compound name.

Type:

str

formula

Chemical formula as “Element1:count1,Element2:count2”.

Type:

str

thickness

Total thickness in Angstroms.

Type:

Parameter[float]

roughness

Interface roughness in Angstroms.

Type:

Parameter[float]

density

Density in g/cm³.

Type:

Parameter[float]

magnetic_density

Magnetic density in g/cm³.

Type:

Parameter[float]

magnetic

Whether compound is magnetic.

Type:

bool

magnetic_direction

Magnetic moment direction.

Type:

Literal

compound_details

Atomic layer structures.

Type:

list[CompoundDetails]

class rxrmask.core.compound.CompoundDetails[source]

Atomic species within a compound layer.

Stores stoichiometric and physical properties for individual atoms in a compound structure.

name

Chemical symbol.

Type:

str

stochiometric_fraction

Stoichiometric coefficient.

Type:

float

atom

Atom object with atomic properties.

Type:

Atom

thickness

Layer thickness in Angstroms.

Type:

Parameter[float]

molar_density

Molar density in mol/cm³.

Type:

Parameter[float]

roughness

Interface roughness in Angstroms.

Type:

Parameter[float]

molar_magnetic_density

Magnetic density in mol/cm³.

Type:

Parameter[float]

rxrmask.core.compound.create_compound(parameters_container, name, formula, thickness, density, atoms, roughness=0.0, magetic_density=0.0)[source]

Create compound with parameters and atomic details.

Parameters:

  • parameters_container (ParametersContainer) – Container for parameter management.

  • name (str) – Compound name.

  • formula (str) – Chemical formula.

  • thickness (float) – Layer thickness.

  • density (float) – Material density.

  • atoms (list[Atom]) – Available atom objects.

  • roughness (float) – Interface roughness.

  • magetic_density (float) – Magnetic density.

Returns:

Configured compound object.

Return type:

Compound

rxrmask.core.compound.get_compound_details(formula, atoms)[source]

Parse formula and create compound details.

Parameters:

  • formula (str) – Chemical formula to parse.

  • atoms (list[Atom]) – Available atom objects.

Returns:

Details for each element in formula.

Return type:

list[CompoundDetails]

Form factor handling for X-ray reflectometry calculations.

Provides interface and implementation for atomic form factor models.

class rxrmask.core.formfactor.FormFactorLocalDB(element, is_magnetic=False)[source]

Form factor model using local database files.

Reads atomic form factors from local text files with support for magnetic and non-magnetic elements.

ff_data

Loaded form factor data.

Type:

pd.DataFrame | None

element

Chemical element symbol.

Type:

str | None

is_magnetic

Whether to load magnetic form factors.

Type:

bool

get_all_formfactors(*args)[source]

Return complete form factor dataset.

Return type:

DataFrame

get_formfactors(energy_eV, *args)[source]

Get form factors at specific energy using interpolation.

Return type:

tuple[float, float]

get_formfactors_energies(energies)[source]

Get form factors for multiple energies using interpolation.

Return type:

list[tuple[float, float]]

read_data()[source]

Read form factor data from local database.

class rxrmask.core.formfactor.FormFactorModel(ff_path=None)[source]

Base class for atomic form factor models.

Defines interface for X-ray form factor calculations.

Path to form factor data file.

Type:

str | None

All form factor data.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

Get form factors at specific energy.

Parameters:

energy_eV (float) – X-ray energy in eV.

Returns:

(f1, f2) form factor components.

Return type:

tuple[float, float]

Get form factors for multiple energies.

Parameters:

Returns:

List of (f1, f2) for each energy.

list[tuple[float, float]]

Return type:

str | None

Layer representation for multilayer X-ray reflectometry structures.

Provides classes for atomic species and layers with optical property calculations.

get_f1f2(energy_eV, *args)[source]

energy_eV (float) – X-ray energy in eV.

Returns:

(f1, f2) form factor components.

Return type:

tuple[float, float]

get_f1f2_energies(energies, *args)[source]

Parameters:

energies (np.ndarray) – Array of energies in eV.

Returns:

List of (f1, f2) for each energy.

Return type:

list[tuple[float, float]]

get_q1q2(energy_eV, *args)[source]

Get magnetic form factors q1 and q2 at specific energy.

Parameters:

energy_eV (float) – X-ray energy in eV.

Returns:

(q1, q2) magnetic form factors, (0, 0) if non-magnetic.

Return type:

tuple[float, float]

class rxrmask.core.layer.Layer(id, thickness, elements=<factory>, precomputed_energy=None, precomputed_index_of_refraction=None, precomputed_magnetic_optical_constant=None)[source]

Single layer in multilayer structure.

Represents a layer with thickness and atomic composition, providing optical property calculations.

id

Unique layer identifier.

Type:

str

thickness

Layer thickness in Angstroms.

Type:

float

elements

Atomic elements in the layer.

Type:

list[AtomLayer]

compute(energy_eV, *args)[source]

Precompute optical properties for given energy.

get_index_of_refraction(energy_eV, *args)[source]

Get complex refractive index for given energy.

Return type:

complex

get_magnetic_optical_constant(energy_eV, *args)[source]

Get magnetic optical constant for given energy.

Return type:

complex

Parameter management for X-ray reflectometry calculations.

Provides parameter classes with type validation, constraints, and fitting capabilities. Supports parameter containers for optimization workflows.

class rxrmask.core.parameter.DerivedParameter(value, id=0, name='', min_value=None, max_value=None, fit=False, update_func=None)[source]

Parameter with automatic update functionality.

update_func

Function to calculate parameter value

update()[source]

Update parameter value using update function.

class rxrmask.core.parameter.Parameter(value, id=0, name='', min_value=None, max_value=None, fit=False)[source]

Parameter with value, constraints, and fitting capability.

value

Parameter value (int, float, str, or complex)

id

Unique identifier

name

Human-readable name

min_value

Minimum value constraint (optional)

max_value

Maximum value constraint (optional)

fit

Enable for fitting/optimization

get(prray=None)[source]

Get parameter value from internal storage or external array.

Parameters:

prray – External parameter array (optional)

Return type:

TypeVar(T)

Returns:

Parameter value

set(value)[source]

Set parameter value with type validation.

Parameters:

value (TypeVar(T)) – New parameter value

Return type:

None

Container for managing parameter collections and fitting workflows.

derived_parameters

List of auto-updating parameters

  • value (Any) – Initial value

update_derived()[source]

Update all derived parameters.

Multilayer structure representation for X-ray reflectometry.

Provides Structure class for managing compounds and layer discretization.

class rxrmask.core.structure.Structure(name, n_compounds)[source]

Complete multilayer structure for X-ray reflectometry.

Manages compounds organization, layer discretization, and density profiles.

name

Structure name.

Type:

str

n_compounds

Number of compounds.

Type:

int

n_layers

Number of discretized layers.

Type:

int

layers

Discretized layer objects.

Type:

list[Layer]

compounds

Compound objects.

Type:

list[Compound | None]

element_data

Cached element data for optimization.

Type:

dict | None

layer_thickness_params

Layer thickness parameters.

Type:

list | None

atoms

Atom objects cache.

Type:

dict | None

add_compound(index, compound)[source]

Add compound at specified index.

Return type:

None

create_layers(params_container, step=0.1)[source]

Create discretized layers from compounds with specified step size.

Return type:

None

update_layers()[source]

Update existing layers with current parameter values.

Return type:

None
